solution.text:
\(\Delta _ {sol} H = \Delta _ {hyd}H + \Delta _ {lattice}H\)
\(\implies Delta _ {sol} H = _{{j + k + l - m + n}}_ - 851\)
\(\implies Delta _ {sol} H = _{{j + k + l - m + n - 851}}_\)

content.text:
Calculate the enthalpy of solution of the \(AgCL\) under the same non-standard conditions used above.
\(\Delta_ {hyd} H\) (for AgCl) \(= -851 \frac{kJ}{mol}\)
